mapper.select: match(d:DiscussPost)-[r:TAGS]->(t:Tags) with count(r) as c,t.tagName as tagName return tagName order by c desc limit 10

match(d:DiscussPost)-[r:TAGS]->(t:Tags{tagName:#{tagName}}) with d.PostId as id,d.userId as userId,d.content as content,d.type as type, d.score as score,d.commentCount as commentCount,d.create_Time as createTime, d.status as status,d.title as title,d.linkUrl as linkUrl where status=0 return id,userId,title,content,type,status,commentCount,linkUrl,score order by score skip #{offset} limit #{limit}

match(d:DiscussPost)-[r:TAGS]->(t:Tags{tagName:#{tagName}}) with d.PostId as id,d.userId as userId,d.content as content,d.type as type, d.score as score,d.commentCount as commentCount,d.create_Time as createTime, d.status as status,d.title as title,d.linkUrl as linkUrl where status=0 and commentCount=0 return id,userId,title,content,type,status,commentCount,linkUrl,score order by score, createTime skip #{offset} limit #{limit}
match(emp:Tags) where emp.tagName =~#{tagName} return emp.tagName as tagName
